name: SKIndexType
desc: Specifies the category of an index.

items.name: var kSKIndexInverted: SKIndexType
items.desc: Specifies an inverted index, mapping terms to documents.

items.name: var kSKIndexVector: SKIndexType
items.desc: Specifies a vector index, mapping documents to terms.

items.name: var kSKIndexInvertedVector: SKIndexType
items.desc: Specifies an index type with all the capabilities of an inverted and a vector index.
